oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Important values in the PhD-project "Crop-Weed interaction determined by sensor techniques (COMSENS)" and the project "Characteristics of spring barley varieties for organic farming (BAR-OF)"
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Hansen, Preben Klarskov
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Research methodology and philosophy
"Organics" in general
Indicators and other value-laden measures
Weed management
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The document describes with the chosen values in the PhD-project “Crop-Weed interaction deter-mined by sensor techniques (COMSENS)” and the project “Characteristics of spring barley varieties for organic farming (BAR-OF)”
